results.name: Expansion of (1 - 2*x^2)/(1 + x)^3. Second column of Riordan triangle A248156.
comment: This is the column k=1 sequence of the Riordan triangle A248156 without a leading zero.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-3,-3,-1).
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Oct 05 2014
